text: Betten is a former municipality in the district of Raron, Canton of Valais in Switzerland. On 1 January 2014, the former municipalities of Betten and Martisberg merged into the new municipality of Bettmeralp.Nomenklaturen â€“ Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz accessed 13 December 2014 ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Former municipalities of Valais
